<center> ![](https://networkarray.com/logo_alt.png) </center>

[NetworkArray ](https://networkarray.com)is a division under REAK Infotech LLP, Parent Company of ServerPolice.
NetworkArray was founded to provide the most customer centric plans and support, we don’t consider people who buy from us as clients, we treat you the same level we once expected to get treated by host when we were running our own websites.

**_VPS Plans_**

**NA - 256 (LEB Special)**

    RAM - 256 MB
    Burst - 512 MB
    CPU - 2 vCore
    Bandwidth - 300 GB
    Disk Space - 50 GB
    IPv4 Address - 1
    Price : 5$/mo
Link: https://secure.networkarray.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=45


**NA - 512 (LEB Special)**

    RAM - 512 MB
    Burst - 1024 MB
    CPU - 3 vCore
    Bandwidth - 500 GB
    Disk Space - 100 GB
    1 IPv4
    Price : 7$/mo
Link: https://secure.networkarray.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=46


**Direct Link, No Coupon Code Required!**


About NetworkArray 

NetworkArray was founded in October 2013, NetwokArray is owned by REAK Infotech LLP (AAB-7853), An IT Services Company based in India. The same Company which brought you ServerPolice in 2012.
NetworkArray is powered by a team of RHCE / cPanel Approved Engineers, Running off the latest hardware with being present in the most sought hosting locations in the world.


Addons Available and Pricing:-

    1 Extra IPv4 $3/month (2.5$ if > 4)
    Extra HDD (Per 20GB) $5/Month
    Extra RAM (Per 128MB) $2/Month
    Extra Bandwidth (Per 100GB) 5$
    Extra Core 7.5$


Features:-

    SolusVM Control Panel
    Hardware RAID 10
    Xeon Processors
    Multiple Location [NL/UK/US]
    1Gbps Port Speed
    IPv6 Available [On Request]
    99.9% Uptime
